availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on November 28, 1813 in Henry County.Minister. Native of Henry County. Married Susan Hall in 1836. Children included: Lucy J.; John N.; Mary; Susan; Jasper; Prudence; James F.; Marion F.; Laura I.; and Douglas H. Died on December 2, 1897 in Seward County Nebraska.

bibl.p:
Memorial and Biographical Record and Illustrated Compendium of Biography
containing a compendium of local biography including biographical sketches of hundreds of prominent old settlers and representative citizens of Butler, Polk, Seward, York and Fillmore Counties, Nebraska (Chicago: Geo. A. Ogle & Co., 1899), 295-296.
